channel.title: Map reset? [opinions needed]
channel.description:
Before I start I'd like to say this is in no way confirming that there will or won't be one in the future. The staff team are just curious as to what your opinions on the subject are.
With 1.5 coming up and 1.4.7 already here we have missed out on a lot of content and will miss out on more. Most importantly witch huts, temples and nether quartz which will change redstone a lot. As well as that the current map has been around a long time and pretty much everywhere has been explored, therefore resulting in a lack of caves and fresh land for new and old players. We understand that a lot of you have put in a lot of time into the current map which is why we're not just going to jump into resetting the map without your feedback.
Please don't give a simple yes or no answer, I want to know your actual opinions along with a reason as to why you do or don't agree with such a change.

item.title: Map reset? [opinions needed]
item.dc:creator: @hemajor hemajor
item.description:
@hemajor wrote:

A map reset would be sad but I think that that is the best option. I would like to be able to explore my own caves and have a fresh start.

Read full topic

item.title: Map reset? [opinions needed]
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

[quote=“kickingjamie, post:11, topic:507319”][quote author=Si Force link=topic=625549.msg4258144#msg4258144 date=1363124878]
It’d be convenient if this happened sooner rather than later if it were to get the go-ahead. There’s no sense in putting it off and in about 2 months nothing has happened yet.
[/quote]
If this were to happen we’d have to wait for all necessary updates from bukkit and our plugin authors etc, which as you know can take a while.[/quote]
Might as well extend map radius for now and fresh start when everything with 1.5 is ready

Read full topic

item.title: Map reset? [opinions needed]
item.dc:creator: @nuggets120 nuggets120
item.description:
@nuggets120 wrote:

yes the map needs to be reset even know that people have put a lot of their time in to it it will be well worth it…

Read full topic

item.title: Map reset? [opinions needed]
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

Si Force:

It’d be convenient if this happened sooner rather than later if it were to get the go-ahead. There’s no sense in putting it off and in about 2 months nothing has happened yet.

If this were to happen we’d have to wait for all necessary updates from bukkit and our plugin authors etc, which as you know can take a while.

Read full topic

item.description:

It’d be convenient if this happened sooner rather than later if it were to get the go-ahead. There’s no sense in putting it off and in about 2 months nothing has happened yet.

item.title: Map reset? [opinions needed]
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

I’m fine with both options suggested but a map reset is inevitable, so why not make it happen sooner?

Read full topic

item.title: Map reset? [opinions needed]
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

I personally support a map reset, it would definitely give everyone a new challenge on the server, and will help us enjoy the new updates to there full potential.

Read full topic

item.title: Map reset? [opinions needed]
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

i vote just expand the map

Read full topic

item.title: Map reset? [opinions needed]
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

We would have to ask moparisthebest after confirming everyone in the community wants this. But the whole point of the map border was to keep the world small for updates like these that way we can just expand the map without having to reset the map.

Read full topic

item.title: Map reset? [opinions needed]
item.dc:creator: @omgilikepie omgilikepie
item.description:
@omgilikepie wrote:

I really wanna say no, but I also would like to say yes. Sadly, things do need to be reset from time to time with the way this game updates, it’s hard to keep up with the new stuff if you keep the same old map. I’d say yes as long as we can get a torrent of the current map.

Or you could try increasing the map size? Not sure if that would help or not as I haven’t been keeping an eye on the updates lately.

Read full topic

item.title: Map reset? [opinions needed]
item.dc:creator: @big_n12 big_n12
item.description:
@big_n12 wrote:

as you know jamie I’ve been a supporter of map resets since the beginning of time.

so I actually wouldn’t mind it being reset. I have always found a fresh start fun and challenging(except in ftb/tekkit,then its bullshit)

Read full topic

item.title: Map reset? [opinions needed]
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

Yes, but put up the map as a torrent so people can save their work, just as what MITB did with the other world.

I’d love to start playing again if the map was reset.

Read full topic

item.title: Map reset? [opinions needed]
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

I think it’s a good idea personally. Coming from somebody who hasn’t played this server properly in a long time, it’s not an appealing prospect knowing that a lot of the resources will have already been mined, therefore it’ll be a difficult prospect to set up again (I have forgotten where most of my bases are). A new map opens up a range of new possibilities and increases our server potential and attractiveness.

With all that being said, I say go for it.

Read full topic
